title: Global tech crackdown

description:

The post Global tech crackdown appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Big Tech has enjoyed years of unfettered growth, but now the U.S., EU, China and India have launched unprecedented crackdowns on some of the biggest names in the business. Lawmakers and regulators are going after anti-competitive practices and looking at privacy and security at companies such as Facebook and Apple, Google and Amazon. Reuters is keeping clients and readers ahead on this huge story, delivering comprehensive coverage and, in some cases, even spurring action by lawmakers and corporations. 

Explore Reuters coverage
